15/*! \file */
16
17#include <config.h>
18
19#if defined(HAVE_SCHED_H)
20#include <sched.h>
21#endif
22
23#if defined(HAVE_CPUSET_H)
24#include <sys/param.h>
25#include <sys/cpuset.h>
26#endif
27
28#if defined(HAVE_SYS_PROCSET_H)
29#include <sys/types.h>
30#include <sys/processor.h>
31#include <sys/procset.h>
32#endif
33
34#include <isc/thread.h>
35#include <isc/util.h>
36
37#ifndef THREAD_MINSTACKSIZE
38#define THREAD_MINSTACKSIZE (1024U * 1024)
39#endif
40
41isc_result_t
42isc_thread_create(isc_threadfunc_t func, isc_threadarg_t arg,
43 isc_thread_t *thread)
44{
45 pthread_attr_t attr;
46#if defined(HAVE_PTHREAD_ATTR_GETSTACKSIZE) && \
47 defined(HAVE_PTHREAD_ATTR_SETSTACKSIZE)
48 size_t stacksize;
49#endif
50 int ret;
51
52 pthread_attr_init(&attr);
53
54#if defined(HAVE_PTHREAD_ATTR_GETSTACKSIZE) && \
55 defined(HAVE_PTHREAD_ATTR_SETSTACKSIZE)
56 ret = pthread_attr_getstacksize(&attr, &stacksize);
57 if (ret != 0)
58 return (ISC_R_UNEXPECTED);
59
60 if (stacksize < THREAD_MINSTACKSIZE) {
61 ret = pthread_attr_setstacksize(&attr, THREAD_MINSTACKSIZE);
62 if (ret != 0)
63 return (ISC_R_UNEXPECTED);
64 }
65#endif
66
67 ret = pthread_create(thread, &attr, func, arg);
68 if (ret != 0)
69 return (ISC_R_UNEXPECTED);
70
71 pthread_attr_destroy(&attr);
72
73 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
74}
75
76#ifdef __NetBSD__
77#define pthread_setconcurrency(a) (void) a/* nothing */
78#endif
79
80void
81isc_thread_setconcurrency(unsigned int level) {
82 (void)pthread_setconcurrency(level);
83}
84
85void
86isc_thread_setname(isc_thread_t thread, const char *name) {
87#if defined(HAVE_PTHREAD_SETNAME_NP) && !defined(__APPLE__)
88 /*
89 * macOS has pthread_setname_np but only works on the
90 * current thread so it's not used here
91 */
92#if defined(__NetBSD__)
93 (void)pthread_setname_np(thread, name, NULL);
94#else
95 (void)pthread_setname_np(thread, name);
96#endif
97#elif defined(HAVE_PTHREAD_SET_NAME_NP)
98 (void)pthread_set_name_np(thread, name);
99#else
100 UNUSED(thread);
101 UNUSED(name);
102#endif
103}
104
105void
106isc_thread_yield(void) {
107#if defined(HAVE_SCHED_YIELD)
108 sched_yield();
109#elif defined( HAVE_PTHREAD_YIELD)
110 pthread_yield();
111#elif defined( HAVE_PTHREAD_YIELD_NP)
112 pthread_yield_np();
113#endif
114}
115
116isc_result_t
117isc_thread_setaffinity(int cpu) {
118#if defined(HAVE_CPUSET_SETAFFINITY)
119 cpuset_t cpuset;
120 CPU_ZERO(&cpuset);
121 CPU_SET(cpu, &cpuset);
122 if (cpuset_setaffinity(CPU_LEVEL_WHICH, CPU_WHICH_TID, -1,
123 sizeof(cpuset), &cpuset) != 0)
124 {
125 return (ISC_R_FAILURE);
126 }
127#elif defined(HAVE_PTHREAD_SETAFFINITY_NP)
128#if defined(__NetBSD__)
129 cpuset_t *cset;
130 cset = cpuset_create();
131 if (cset == NULL)
132 return (ISC_R_FAILURE);
133 cpuset_set(cpu, cset);
134 if (pthread_setaffinity_np(pthread_self(),
135 cpuset_size(cset), cset) != 0)
136 {
137 cpuset_destroy(cset);
138 return (ISC_R_FAILURE);
139 }
140 cpuset_destroy(cset);
141#else /* linux? */
142 cpu_set_t set;
143 CPU_ZERO(&set);
144 CPU_SET(cpu, &set);
145 if (pthread_setaffinity_np(pthread_self(), sizeof(cpu_set_t),
146 &set) != 0)
147 {
148 return (ISC_R_FAILURE);
149 }
150#endif /* __NetBSD__ */
151#elif defined(HAVE_PROCESSOR_BIND)
152 if (processor_bind(P_LWPID, P_MYID, cpu, NULL) != 0) {
153 return (ISC_R_FAILURE);
154 }
155#else
156 UNUSED(cpu);
157#endif
158 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
159}
